explains: adj. 湿滑的，容易打滑的；<非正式>狡猾的，不可靠的；模棱两可的，模糊的
wordGroup: slippery slope n. 灾难性的急剧下滑

sentences.en: The tiled floor was wet and slippery.
She tried to get a purchase on the slippery rock.
sentences.cn: 她设法抓牢光滑的岩石。

sentences.en: Don't believe what he says—he's a slippery customer.
sentences.cn: 他说什么你可别信—他是个滑头。
